title: When They Hate You, Disney Keeps Closeting Characters 3.18.21
itunes:title: When They Hate You, Disney Keeps Closeting Characters 3.18.21
description:
In episode 839, Jack and Miles are joined by The Cast's co-host Jacquis Neal to discuss the Atlanta killing spree at a massage parlor and how the media portrayed the killer, Biden supporting reforming Senate filibuster, Elliot Page, Disney characters who could be LGBTQIA+, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Massage Parlor Rampage Killer Floats ‘Sex Addiction’ Claim
  2. "A REALLY BAD DAY FOR HIM" This is how white supremacy protects itself. Obscuring their hateful actions as a mere lashing out, a tantrum, one where lives were lost.
  3. Atlanta ‘sex addict shooter’ Robert Aaron Long charged after ‘killing 8’ at massage parlors to ‘take out temptation’
  4. Biden says he supports reforming Senate filibuster in ABC News exclusive interview
  5. Elliot Page Is Ready for This Moment
  6. Box Office: ‘Raya and the Last Dragon’ Repeats No. 1 With $5.5 Million
  7. Raya and the Last Dragon’s Kelly Marie Tran Thinks Her Disney Princess Is Gay
  8. Disney’s newest princess is gay, according to Raya and the Dragon star Kelly Marie Tran
  9. Wait a Sec — Are the Main Characters in Pixar’s ‘Luca’ Gay?
  10. People are deeply divided over the ‘Call Me By Your Name’ vibes in Pixar’s new animated film ‘Luca’
  11. Disney's First Feature Animated Movie With Queer Leads May Never Be Released
  12. Exclusive: Disney's Cancelled LGBTQ-Themed 'Nimona' Movie Would've Starred Chloë Grace Moretz, Riz Ahmed - But There's Still Hope
  13. WATCH: If You Want It - Sly Dunbar

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
